Detailed Description

Base class for all dynamic index buffer functionality.

Member Function Documentation

IndexBuffer Moo::DynamicIndexBufferBase::indexBuffer (  )  [inline]

IndicesReference Moo::DynamicIndexBufferBase::lock ( uint32  nLockIndices  ) 

Lock the index buffer for the required size / format.

This method will not grow the existing size but mearly re-create it.

Parameters:
nLockIndices Number of indices to lock.
Returns:
A reference to the locked portion of memory representing the buffer.

IndicesReference Moo::DynamicIndexBufferBase::lock2 ( uint32  nLockIndices  ) 

Lock the index buffer for the required size / format.

This method WILL grow the existing size of the buffer unlike lock(..).

Parameters:
nLockIndices Number of indices to lock.
Returns:
A reference to the locked portion of memory representing the buffer.

uint32 Moo::DynamicIndexBufferBase::lockIndex (  )  const [inline]

Returns:
the index of the first index locked in the last lock call.

HRESULT Moo::DynamicIndexBufferBase::unlock (  ) 

Unlock a previously locked index buffer.

Returns:
The result of the lock.
